NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
PLUME: The species appears to normally dwell deep underwater, near the core of the planet. Yet on our first expedition to this planet, we were greeted by the sight of these lifeforms <color=orange>on the surface of the ocean.</color>
2 1
MELORAE: As they lack faculties to motivate fear or curiosity, it seems unlikely our presence is the cause of their sudden timidity. Yet, since that first expedition, we have never thus far observed this phenomenon again!
3
2
COLEUS: Until we find a way to study more live specimens, I am unsure we will be able to learn more about this species.
4
3
THATCH: What if we were to craft a habitat suited to the species, and transport one of these frozen specimens back to the <color=orange>Looming City?</color> If successful, this might allow us to study a live specimen unimpeded!
CJelly EX3 4
SF Jelly R3 4
